overview: This subject provides those students wishing to progress to a higher research degree the opportunity to plan, conduct, and report individual research in a business administration discipline.
ilo: Produce original individual work in an appropriate format which demonstrates research skills in the application or development of theory and research methods in a business administration discipline.
Present their research professionally in a way that demonstrates the impact of their research.

assessment.hurdle: Students are required to pass this assignment to pass the subject
